library("dplyr")
library("readr")
mk_url <- function(x) {
  ifelse(nchar(trimws(x))==0,x,
         sprintf("[%s](https://mac-theobio.github.io/DataViz/%s.html)",
                 x,x))
}
dd <- (read_csv("sched.csv", comment="#")
  %>% mutate(`lecture notes`=mk_url(`lecture notes`))
)
